Package model

Class Sort

java.lang.Object
model.Sort
public class Sort extends Object
The Sort class provides methods to sort a list of projects based on different criteria.

  • Constructor Details

    • Sort

      public Sort(ArrayList<Project> listToSort, Sort.Order order, Sort.SortingCategory sortingCategory, Sort.ProjectType projectType)
      Constructs a new Sort object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      listToSort - The list of projects to be sorted.
      order - The order of sorting (increasing or decreasing).
      sortingCategory - The category by which to sort the projects (money, monthsSpent, date).
      projectType - The type of projects to include in the sorting.

    • sortByOnlyOneType

      public ArrayList<Project> sortByOnlyOneType(Sort.Order order, Sort.ProjectType type)
      Sorts the list of projects by only the specified project type.
